ygData.subject: Re: Persistence
ygData.msgSnippet: Around what level is this guy? If he is close to mine (16 paladin) I would like to know.
ygData.messageBody:
Around what level is this guy? If he is close to mine (16 paladin) I would
like to know.

"Noah D. Burt" wrote:

> From: "Noah D. Burt" <noahburt@...>
>
> Hey there,
> Brother Kingdok here again. I received a /tell
> yesterday from a concerned party on Erollisi Marr
> asking the name of the greedy monk I spoke of
> yesterday. I do not feel it is right to post his name
> on the lits but if you are on Erollisi Marr and wish
> to know his name, email me and I will tell you. I do
> not wish people to bother him, that is why I didn't
> post his name. HE does have the right to be a jerk
> even if i do not like it. So please ask only if you
> wish to know his name in case you are ever in party
> with him or have the chance to be. Please do not
> harass him. I do not wish him ill, but I do understand
> why people would want to know so that they would not
> have the misfortune of having an evening spoiled by
> his greed and poor sportsmanship.
>
> May truth guide you,
> Brother Kingdok
